help-file.title: "ETHERPORTAL"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> & <victim> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Approximately 30 seconds or until its limit is reached Type of spell: Elemental
"Etherportal" causes a rupture in the ether before the caster and the victim, opening an artery of pure light energy that serves as a conduit between those two points. This allows directed teleportation of large numbers of people between those locations.
